summary: To impress a foxy divorcee, ladies' man Nick offers to take her kids on an extended road trip, unaware of the torture he's in for.

Turner|Derek Lowe|Sean Millington|Shiraine Haas|David MacKay|Esme Lambert|Jerry Hardin|Curtis Butchart|C. Ernst Harth|Denalda Williams|Robert Manitopyes|Nichelle Nichols|Lee Jay Bamberry|John Destry|Tyler Eyres|Vicky Lambert|Celeste White Steele
title: ¿Cuándo llegamos?
